text: my name is Shireen laham Barham I'm a
software development manager and I've
been at AWS for the past two and a half
years I have recently transitioned from
a software engineer role to a software
development manager role the team that I
am on is building a conferencing
platform that will change the way that
our customers do incident calls
before I joined AWS I was in a different
field and I joined AWS because I was
looking for a challenge I was looking
for more Innovation and that is what I
found here Innovation is the most
exciting part of my job I love to see an
idea go through
something written on a piece of paper to
a full product and then releasing that
product for our customers and seeing the
joy and how much impact our customers
get from our products
I'm currently working with my team both
virtually and at the office
we don't have any specific days that we
meet at the office it is more trying to
meet when there is a need for
collaboration
and when that is not possible we also
have the specific tools that we can use
so that we can collaborate virtually
working from home has also contributed
to work-life balance so the commute time
has been reduced and I can use that time
to either work out in the morning or
spend some extra time with my family
outside of my main role in AWS I work
with young girls in secondary schools to
increase their awareness about high-tech
and AWS in general to know about their
opportunities
for someone thinking about joining AWS I
would say don't hesitate
get the interviews done try your best
and don't think that you need to tick
all the boxes in order to get a rule at
AWS
